name: For Whom The Jingle Bell Tolls

description:
Japanese title: Deai (出会い)

A look back into the early years when Naruto and Sasuke first met.
name: Meeting

story_arc_credits.name: Four Week Long Special Project For the Broadcast's Tenth Anniversary

first_appearance_storyarcs.name: Four Week Long Special Project For the Broadcast's Tenth Anniversary

description:
Japanese title: Raibaru (ライバル)

During the Chunin Exam, Sasuke witnesses Naruto’s growth as a shinobi.
name: Rivals

story_arc_credits.name: Four Week Long Special Project For the Broadcast's Tenth Anniversary

first_appearance_storyarcs.name: Four Week Long Special Project For the Broadcast's Tenth Anniversary

description:
Japanese title: Kiretsu (亀裂)

Sasuke’s defeat to Gaara, and later Itachi, forces him to realize that he is not strong enough to get revenge against his older brother.
name: Rift

story_arc_credits.name: Four Week Long Special Project For the Broadcast's Tenth Anniversary

first_appearance_storyarcs.name: Four Week Long Special Project For the Broadcast's Tenth Anniversary

description:
Japanese title: Ribetsu (離別)

Naruto is determined to save Sasuke, who has deserted the Hidden Leaf.
name: Parting

story_arc_credits.name: Four Week Long Special Project For the Broadcast's Tenth Anniversary

first_appearance_storyarcs.name: Four Week Long Special Project For the Broadcast's Tenth Anniversary

description:
Japanese title: Tomo no Tame ni (友のために)

The Allied Shinobi Forces are on standby, ready to confront Madara’s army of reanimated shinobi and 100,000 White Zetsu. But distrust still exists among the Allied Shinobi Forces, who were once sworn enemies until recently.
name: For My Friend

description:
Japanese title: Kaisen! (開戦!)

Kankuro’s commando unit enters enemy territory to set up a stronghold for the Allied Shinobi Forces. They are immediately ambushed by the Akatsuki’s own commando unit comprised of the reanimated Deidara and Sasori.
name: War Begins!

description:
Japanese title: Sai to Shin (サイとシン)

The Allied Shinobi Forces’ commando unit engages with the Akatsuki in the first wave of battle.
name: Sai and Shin

description:
Japanese title: Edo Tensei no Himitsu (穢土転生の秘密)

Under the guidance of Killer Bee, Naruto enters the final stage of training to master the Tailed Beast Bomb, a Jinchuriki’s most powerful technique.
name: Secrets of the Reanimation Jutsu

description:
Japanese title: Shukuteki to no Saikai (宿敵との再会)

The commando unit is in hot water as they engage the reanimated Kekkei Genkai shinobi, which include Zabuza Momochi and Haku. Luckily, Kakashi and his unit arrive in time to assist them.
name: An Old Nemesis Returns

description:
Japanese title: Saisho no Teki, Saigo no Teki (最初の敵, 最後の敵)

Kakashi and his unit devise a strategy to take on the Kekkei Genkai shinobi, but it’s foiled by Kabuto, who uses the Reanimation Jutsu to summon the most powerful members of the Seven Ninja Swordsmen of the Mist.
name: The First and Last Opponent

description:
Japanese title: Konoha no Tensai Gunshi (木ノ葉の天才軍師)

The Akatsuki dispatch an army of powerful reanimated shinobi and White Zetsu across the war zone, causing chaos within the Allied Shinobi Forces’ chain of command.
name: The Brilliant Military Advisor of the Hidden Leaf

description:
Japanese title: Sorezore no Gekisen!! (それぞれの激戦!!)

As Darui and his First Company engage an army of White Zetsu, the remaining forces must deal with reanimated shinobi.
name: Battleground!

description:
Japanese title: Enu Jī Wādo (NGワード)

Atsui, Samui, and Darui face off against Kinkaku and Ginkaku, the legendary brothers from the Hidden Cloud, feared even by the Raikage.
name: Forbidden Words

description:
Japanese title: Konjiki no Kizuna (金色の絆)

Darui manages to seal away Ginkaku. Fueled by the rage of losing his brother, Kinkaku transforms into a monster that resembles a jinchuriki’s Tailed Beast State.
name: Golden Bonds

first_appearance_objects.name: Demonic Statue of the Outer Path

object_credits.name: Demonic Statue of the Outer Path

description:
Japanese title:

Ino sees Sakura falling from the sky. Although she manages to save her, the shock of the fall has left Sakura with amnesia.
name: Road to Sakura

description:
Japanese title: Mifune vs Hanzō (ミフネVS半蔵)

Kankuro’s Commando Unit is cornered by Hanzo’s poison attack. Fortunately, Mifune and his Fifth Company arrive in time to provide assistance.
name: Mifune vs. Hanzo

description:
Japanese title: Hontō no Yasashisa (本当 の優しさ)

The Ino-Shika-Cho trio is ordered by Shikaku to take down the reanimated Asuma. Remembering Asuma’s final words, Shikamaru and Ino are determined to stop their former teacher.
name: True Kindness

description:
Japanese title: Kanpeki na Inoshikachō!! (完璧な猪鹿蝶!!)

Choji is unable to attack Asuma and loses his will to fight. Ino and Shikamaru try to snap Choji out of his paralysis.
name: The Complete Ino-Shika-Cho Formation!

description:
Japanese title: Kokoro no Naka no Tegami (心の中の手紙)

While training in Chakra Mode, Naruto senses the presence of the Nine Tails’ chakra seeping from Kinkaku outside. Curious to find out what’s happening, Naruto tries to leave the training room when Iruka suddenly steps in to stop him.
name: A Message from the Heart

description:
Japanese title: Gedō Mazō no Shūrai (外道魔像の襲来)

The Allied Shinobi Forces are on the verge of winning the war when Madara Uchiha appears. Madara summons the giant Gedo Statue and unleashes its devastating power.
name: Attack of the Gedo Statue

first_appearance_objects.name: Demonic Statue of the Outer Path

object_credits.name: Demonic Statue of the Outer Path

description:
Japanese title: Wakai no In (和解の印)

Naruto and Killer Bee rush to the battlefield when Nine Tails suddenly speaks to Naruto inside his mind. The Nine Tails questions Naruto’s intent to end the hatred in the world and reminds him of how he was unable to save Sasuke.
name: Unison Sign

description:
Japanese title: Nerawareta Iryō Ninja (狙われた医療忍者)

Over at the Medical Unit camp, Sakura and the other medic ninja work nonstop to treat the wounded. Neji is there to recover from overusing his Byakugan.
name: Medic Ninja in Danger

description:
Japanese title: Shiro Zetsu no Torappu (白ゼツの罠)

Kiba, Shino, and Hinata are sent to investigate an area where the Akatsuki are supposedly getting through. There, the three are ambushed by a White Zetsu and get separated.
name: White Zetsu's Trap

description:
Japanese title: Geijutsuka no Bigaku (芸術家の美学)

Back at the Fifth Company’s camp, Kurotsuchi attempts to negotiate with the captive Deidara to find out Kabuto’s location, but is quickly rebuffed.
name: Aesthetics of an Artist

description:
Japanese title: Kā-chan Rengōgun!! (母ちゃん連合軍!!)

With many of the shinobi away serving in the Fourth Great Ninja War, the Leaf Village is left with the mothers and children to protect it. Konohamaru is eager to guard the village but is discouraged by the adults who tell him to go about his day as usual.
name: The Allied Mom Force!!

description:
Japanese title: Hiwa: Saikyō Taggu!! (秘話・最強タッグ!!)

Tsunade and the Raikage arrive to prevent Naruto and Killer Bee from joining the battle. But the two Kage fail to convince the Jinchuriki to turn back, forcing the Raikage to use extreme force.
name: The Secret Origin of the Ultimate Tag Team!

description:
Japanese title: Futatsu no Taiyō!! (二つの太陽!!)

Fourth Raikage Ay attacks Naruto in an attempt to prevent the Jinchuriki from falling into Madara’s hands. Ay is unwilling to listen to either Tsunade or Killer Bee’s pleas to change his mind.
name: Two Suns

description:
Japanese title: Kabutowari! Akebino Jinin (兜割! 通草野餌人)

Kakashi assigns Sai to take over for the Sealing Corps, who are recovering from sealing the reanimated shinobi.
name: Helmet Splitter: Jinin Akebino!

deck: Steven and Connie want a new ending to a beloved book series, they have recently read and so Steven takes them into Rose’s Room to re-enact it.
name: Open Book

description:
Japanese title: Shakuton Tsukai! Sunagakure no Pakura (灼遁使い! 砂隠れのパクラ)

A group of Allied Shinobi, including Omoi and Maki of the Sand, battle against several reanimated enemies.
name: User of the Scorch Style: Pakura of the Sand!

description:
Japanese title: Torimodosenai mono (取り戻せないもの)

Still coping with the loss of her loved ones, Tsunade indulges in gambling and drinking. Around the same time, the Raikage Ay and his men are on a mission to steal a scroll from a certain village.
name: Things You Can’t Get Back

description:
Japanese title: Kakeru ni Ataisuru mono (賭けるに値する者)

The Raikage Ay and his team suffer critical injuries during an enemy attack.
name: One Worth Betting On

description:
Japanese title: Kyōi, Jinpachi - Kushimaru Konbi!! (脅威、甚八・串丸コンビ!!)

Kakashi races to the scene where the Seven Ninja Swordsmen Kushimaru Kuriarare and Jinpachi Munashi were last sighted.
name: Danger: Jinpachi and Kushimaru!

description:
Japanese title: Raitō!! Ringo Ameyuri (雷刀!! 林檎雨由利)

Omoi’s unit is attacked by Ameyuri Ringo of the Seven Ninja Swordsmen and loses one of Omoi’s men. Omoi attempts to avenge his comrade, but Nurui orders everyone to retreat.
name: Lightning Blade: Ameyuri Ringo!

description:
Japanese title: (「力-Chikara-」episode1)

Naruto and his team are assigned a mission to identify and hunt down the perpetrator of the Tonika Village massacre. It’s been a while since Naruto has had a mission, and he’s pumped to take it on.
name: Power: Episode 1

description:
Japanese title: (「力-Chikara-」episode2)

While investigating the village near Tonika, Kabuto confronts Naruto. An epic battle erupts as Kabuto uses the forbidden Reanimation Jutsu against Naruto. In the meantime, Dokku and the five survivors lie low at the village.
name: Power - Episode 2

description:
Japanese title: (「力-Chikara-」episode3)

Naruto and Sakura decide to stay at Shiseru’s house overnight to help watch over the survivors. Although the children cry and miss their deceased parents, Dokku and Shiseru try hard to bring everyone together as a new family.
name: Power - Episode 3

description:
Japanese title: (「力-Chikara-」episode4)

A clone possessing the Nine Tails’ chakra emerges from Naruto’s body. Seeking more power, the clone goes on a rampage, destroying everything in its path.
name: Power - Episode 4

description:
Japanese title: (「力-Chikara-」episode5)

After their defeat by the Nine Tails’ clone, Naruto and Dokku are taken captive by Kabuto.
name: Power: Episode 5

description:
Japanese title: (「力-Chikara-」episode Final)

The legendary Ama no Hoko imbues the Nine Tails’ clone with enough power to destroy the world. Naruto is overcome by its immense power and lies unconscious.
name: Power: Episode Final

description:
Japanese title: Naruto, Sansen!! (ナルト, 参戦!!)

Naruto makes his entrance onto the battlefield and uses his sensory powers to detect and destroy the transformed White Zetsu clones. During the battle, Shikaku updates Naruto with what they currently know on Madara.
name: Naruto Enters the Battle

description:
Japanese title: Chichi no Omoi, Haha no Ai (父の想い, 母の愛)

Gaara leads the Fourth Company into battle against the previous Kage, including his father, the late Fourth Kazekage. The Fourth Kazekage attacks Gaara in order to determine if his son is truly worthy to be the current Kazekage.
name: A Father’s Hope, a Mother’s Love

description:
Japanese title: Tsuini Sesshoku!! Naruto VS Itachi (ついに接触!! ナルトVSイタチ)

Naruto and Killer Bee engage in battle against the reanimated Itachi Uchiha and Nagato. Itachi learns from Naruto that Sasuke has chosen the path of vengeance.
name: Contact! Naruto vs. Itachi

description:
Japanese title: Mitomerareshi Mono (認められし者)

Itachi uses the ultimate genjutsu technique Koto Amatsukami to free himself from the Reanimation Jutsu. Itachi then joins Naruto and Killer Bee to fight Nagato, who is still under Kabuto’s control.
name: The Acknowledged One

description:
Japanese title: Mizukage to Ōhamaguri to Shinkirō (水影と蜃と蜃気楼)

The Fourth Company continue their fight against the reanimated Kage. Gaara and Ohnoki team up to hold off Second Tsuchikage Mu, while the remaining shinobi take on the Second Mizukage, who is willing to be sealed away.
name: The Mizukage, the Giant Clam, and the Mirage

description:
Japanese title: Mujun (矛盾)

Temari leads the attack on the Third Raikage using Wind Style, but even her strongest jutsu is not enough to penetrate the Raikage’s invincible armor.
name: Paradox

description:
Japanese title: Kyōfu – Jōki Bōi (恐怖・蒸危暴威)

Gaara and Ohnoki manage to overcome the Second Mizukage’s mirage attack. Having taken an interest in Gaara, the Second Mizukage decides to further test the young Kage’s skills.
name: Terror! the Steam Imp

description:
Japanese title: Kako no Bōrei (過去の亡霊)

Shikamaru, Choji, Neji, and Kiba find themselves up against some familiar faces from the past. The Sound Ninja Four have been brought back by Kabuto’s Reanimation Jutsu, and they are ready to seek vengeance.
name: Ghosts from the Past

description:
Japanese title: Yomi Tenshin no Jutsu (黄泉転身の術)

Shikamaru, Neji, Choji, and Kiba succeed in defeating the Sound Ninja Four. But the enemy uses the Underworld Transfer Jutsu to trap the Leaf shinobi’s souls inside a barrier.
name: The Underworld Transfer Jutsu

description:
Japanese title: Fukushūsha (復讐者)

Time is running out for the Leaf shinobi whose souls are trapped inside the Sound Four’s barrier. Ino and Shino exhaust their own chakra to keep their friends alive.
name: The Vengeful

description:
Japanese title: Kokoro no Me (心の目)

Hinata defends Neji from a White Zetsu clone while he’s recovering from an earlier fight. She then remembers the time Neji protected her the same way after she temporarily lost her sight.
name: The Heart’s Eye

description:
Japanese title: Gekkō ni Kiyu (月光に消ゆ)

Three years ago, Leaf Anbu Yugao Uzuki lost her lover Hayate Gekko in battle. Unable to cope with his death, Yugao has since left the Anbu and joined the Medical Corps. Meanwhile, Kabuto has reanimated Hayate.
name: Fade Into the Moonlight

description:
Japanese title: Mikazuki no Yoru (三日月の夜)

Yugao is ordered by Sukui to track down the reanimated Hayate. Still shaken by her lover’s unexpected return as an enemy, Yugao manages to catch up to Hayate and his men.
name: Crescent Moon Night

description:
Japanese title: Ē-Ranku Ninmu: Gozen Jiai (A級任務・御膳試合)

Naruto arrives to help a team of Allied Shinobi Forces led by Karui, who are struggling against a reanimated samurai. Naruto recognizes the samurai as Tatewaki, a man he met during a past mission.
name: The A-Rank Mission: Food Fight!

description:
Japanese title: Rakujō (落城)

The Leaf Shinobi succeed in bringing young lord Shu into custody, placing a disguised Naruto as his double. But Tatewaki soon uncovers Naruto’s identity and surrounds the intruder with his men.
name: The Fallen Castle

description:
Japanese title:

Madara is prepping his new jutsu Limited Tsukuyomi, choosing Naruto as his test subject. Meanwhile, Naruto is spending his day off alone in his room. Thinking that Naruto is lonely, Lee suggests they all go to the bathhouse for some relaxation.

This is the prologue to "Naruto the Movie: Road to Ninja".
name: Prologue of Road to Ninja

description:
Japanese title: Rōjin to Ryū no Me (老人と龍の目)

Might Guy arrives on the battlefield to stop a Reanimated Shinobi who he recognizes as Master Chen, the legendary Taijutsu User from the Third Great Ninja War.
name: The Old Master and the Dragon’s Eye

description: Hulk reluctantly fills in as Mayor of Vista Verde, while Red and Skaar leave the team to start their own webcast as super-villain bounty hunters. Their first target? Abomination!
name: The Tale of Hercules

series.name: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H.

description: Kid Flash wants to join the Titans, but Robin insists that he can't because Flash is just a 'one-trick pony.'
name: Multiple Trick Pony

description: The guys want to help Party Horse pass his U.S. history test.
name: Party House

description: Hulk allows himself to be turned back into his human form of Bruce Banner, but then struggles with the decision to become Hulk again when Ronan launches an alien attack!
name: Banner Day

series.name: Hulk and the Agents of S.M.A.S.H.

description: When Wolfe escapes confinement, it's up to Walker, Pilgrim and Triphammer to take him out before he gets loose on the world.
name: Devil In A Garbage Bag

deck: Casey Jones attempts to clean up the city all by himself!
name: Casey Jones VS. the Underworld

has_staff_review.name: Teenage mutant Ninja Turtles Episode 314 - "Casey Jones vs. the Underworld"

description:
Japanese title: Shikkaku? Kakashi no Ketsuron (失格?カカシの結論)

With the threat of failure hanging over their heads, Naruto, Sasuke and Sakura try everything they know to pass the grueling survival test.
name: You Failed! Kakashi's Final Decision

description:
Japanese title: Jūyō ninmu! Nami no Kuni e chō-shuppatsu! (重要任務!波の国へ超出発!)

Naruto and his squad start their first ninja missions with boring and menial tasks. Weary and angry, Naruto vents his frustration at the Hokage.
name: A Dangerous Mission! Journey to the Land of Waves!

description:
Japanese title: Kiri no ansatsusha! (霧の暗殺者!)

Naruto and his squad arrive in the Land of the Waves and learn that an evil businessman named Gato has taken over the land.
name: The Assassin of the Mist!

description:
Japanese title: Itami ni chikau ketsui (痛みに誓う決意)

Kakashi has the upper hand in his battle with Zabuza.
name: The Oath of Pain

description:
Japanese title: Sharingan no Kakashi (写輪眼のカカシ)

Thanks to Naruto's ingenious plan, Kakashi is freed from the water prison.
name: Kakashi: Sharingan Warrior

deck: Keeping the zombies behind walls doesn't mean life can go back to the way it was.
name: Try

deck: "Liv (Rose McIver), Ravi (Rahul Kohli) and Clive (Malcolm Goodwin) work together to solve the mysterious death of a well-known painter.
description: Liv (Rose McIver), Ravi (Rahul Kohli) and Clive (Malcolm Goodwin) work together to solve the mysterious death of a well-known painter. Liv finds herself consumed with passion after eating his brain, and can't resist trying to seduce Major (Robert Buckley). Meanwhile, Blaine (David Anders) makes a surprise visit to the morgue.
name: Brother, Can You Space a Brain?

has_staff_review.name: iZombie Episode #102: "Brother, Can You Spare a Brain?"

description:
Japanese title: Chakura no mori (チャクラの森)

Recuperating at Tazuna's house, Kakashi is dissatisfied with the outcome of the battle.
name: The Forest of Chakra

description:
Japanese title: Eiyū no ita kuni (英雄のいた国)

Sakura goes into town with Tazuna and sees the hardships that the people of the Land of Waves suffer under Gato's rule. Meanwhile, Naruto and Sasuke continue to train, using chakra to climb a tree.
name: The Land Where a Hero Once Lived

description:
Japanese title: Kyōjō kessen! Zabuza futatabi!! (橋上決戦!ザブザ再び!!)

While Naruto concentrates on the training to control his chakra, a mysterious person suddenly appears before him.
name: Battle on the Bridge! Zabuza Returns!!

description:
Japanese title: Haku no hijutsu - Makyō Hyōshō (白の秘術·魔鏡氷晶)

Once again, the time has come to fight Zabuza, and this time he's got company--the tracking ninja who supposedly killed him.
name: Haku's Secret Jutsu: Crystal Ice Mirrors

description:
Japanese title: Igaisei nanbā wan, Naruto sansen! (意外性No. 1, ナルト参戦!)

Sasuke finds himself in a pinch inside of Haku's Crystal Ice Mirrors, but Naruto comes to the rescue.
name: The Number One Hyperactive, Knucklehead Ninja Joins the Fight!!

description:
Japanese title: Shikai zero no tatakai - Sharingan kuzushi (視界ゼロの戦い·写輪眼崩し)

Realizing time is of the essence, Kakashi decides to use the Sharingan once again to defeat Zabuza.
name: Zero Visibility: The Sharingan Shatters

description:
Japanese title: Kaihōsareta fūin (解放された封印)

Naruto and Sasuke continue to receive punishing attacks from within Haku's Crystal Ice Mirrors.
name: The Broken Seal

description:
Japanese title: Shiroi Kako - Himeta omoi (白い過去·秘めた想い)

Naruto finally explodes! His anger against Haku, who defeated Sasuke, unleashes the power of the Nine-tailed Fox.
name: White Past: Hidden Ambition

description:
Japanese title: Shinobi to iu na no dōgu (忍という名の道具)

Naruto strongly questions Haku's philosophy of existing only to fight and win. Meanwhile, the battle between Kakashi and Zabuza approaches its climax.
name: The Weapons Known as Shinobi

description:
Japanese title: Zabuza yuki ni chiru... (ザブザ雪に散る...)

Thinking of Haku, Naruto angrily confronts Zabuza. Zabuza is devastated by the loss of Haku, the only person he could trust in the world.
name: The Demon in the Snow

description:
Japanese title: Shinshō totsunyū! Chūnin Shiken dattebayo (新章突入!中忍試験だってばよ)

Naruto and his team return to the Village Hidden in the Leaves after their battle in Land of Waves.
name: A New Chapter Begins: The Chunin Exam!

description:
Japanese title: Nanore! Arawareta kyōteki tachi!! (名乗れ!現れた強敵たち!!)

Naruto, Sasuke and Sakura are among those chosen to take the Chunin (middle rank ninja) Qualification Exam.
name: Identify Yourself: Powerful New Rivals

description:
Japanese title: Kiai hyaku-nijū pāsento Nau de rokku na chōsenjō! (気合い120% ナウでロックな挑戦状!)

As Naruto, Sasuke and Sakura prepare for the exam, a ninja with short bobbed hair and thick eyebrows named Rock Lee appears. Lee proceeds to challenge Sasuke to a duel.
name: Chunin Challenge: Rock Lee Vs. Sasuke!

description:
Japanese title: Kechirase raibaru! Rūkī nain zen'in shūgō (蹴散らせライバル!新人9人全員集合)

Naruto, Sasuke and Sakura officially register for the Chunin Exam. In this examination, three ninja form a team, and in order to pass, not a single member is allowed to fail. Teamwork becomes absolutely vital for success in this test.
name: Genin Takedown! All Nine Rookies Face Off!

description:
Japanese title: Ikinari shikkaku? Chō-nankan no daiichi shiken (いきなり失格?超難関の第一試験)

Naruto and his team begin the first exam, a written test. The exam proctor is a special jonin (upper rank ninja) named Ibiki Morino, who is an infamous expert in interrogation.
name: Start Your Engines: The Chunin Exam Begins!

description:
Japanese title: Detatoko shōbu! Funbaridokoro no jū monme (出たとこ勝負!踏ん張りどころの10問目)

The hardest part of the first exam comes with question 10. Before the ninja hear the question, Ibiki declares what seems like a harsh and unreasonable rule for that problem...
name: The Tenth Question: All or Nothing!

description:
Japanese title: Zettai hikken! Shi no Mori chokusen rupo! Konoha no gakkyū shinbun da kore! (絶対必見!死の森直前ルポ!木ノ葉の学級新聞だコレ!)

Konohamaru, the grandson of the Leaf Village's Third Hokage, shows up at the Chunin Exam site.
name: Special Report: Live from the Forest of Death!

description:
Japanese title: Daini shiken sutāto! Mawari wa minna teki darake! (第二試験スタート!周りはみんな敵だらけ!)

Naruto and his fellow participants arrive at the Forest of Death, the site of the second part of the Chunin Exam.
name: The Chunin Exam Stage 2: The Forest of Death

description:
Japanese title: Kū ka kuwareru ka! Esa ni natta Naruto (喰うか喰われるか!エサになったナルト)

The second exam starts in the Forest of Death. Sasuke notices that an enemy has disguised himself as Naruto.
name: Eat or be Eaten: Panic in the Forest

description:
Japanese title: Naruto hangeki! Nigenēndattebayo! (ナルト反撃!逃げねーんだってばよ!)

The Grass ninja that attacks Sasuke and Sakura has more power than the two can handle.
name: Naruto's Counterattack: Never Give In!

description:
Japanese title: Yomigaere Sharingan! Hissatsu: Katon Ryūka no Jutsu! (蘇れ写輪眼!必殺·火遁龍火の術!)

Seeing Naruto furiously fight back against the Grass ninja, Sasuke realizes that he was wrong to think about fleeing the scene of a battle.
name: The Sharingan Revived: Dragon-Flame Jutsu!

description:
Japanese title: Geki mayu puratonikku! Boku wa shinu made anata o mamoru!! (激まゆプラトニック!僕は死ぬまでアナタを守る!!)

After receiving the report from her staff, Anko senses that Orochimaru has snuck into the examination.
name: Bushy Brow's Pledge: Undying Love and Protection!

description:
Japanese title: Sakura saku! Ketsui no ushiro sugata (サクラ咲く!決意の後ろ姿)

Protecting Sakura, who can no longer move, Lee battles the three Sound ninja himself.
name: Sakura Blossoms!

description:
Japanese title: Muteki no fōmēshon! InoShikaChō!! (無敵のフォーメーション!いのシカチョウ!!)

While Sakura fends off the Sound ninja attack by herself, the rival Ino team appears!
name: Battle Formation: Ino-Shika-Cho!
